top_articles.summary: GTIG and Mandiant said the zero-day tracked as CVE-2026-22769 has been exploited by UNC6201 since at least 2024.

top_articles.title: Chinese hackers exploiting Dell zero-day flaw since mid-2024
top_articles.summary: A suspected Chinese state-backed hacking group has been quietly exploiting a critical Dell security flaw in zero-day attacks that started in mid-2024.

top_articles.title: Google Patches First Actively Exploited Chrome Zero-Day of 2026
top_articles.summary: A Chrome 145 update fixes CVE-2026-2441, a vulnerability that can likely be exploited for arbitrary code execution.
